thread.title: Photos: Archbishop Aymond washes the feet of inmates in honor of Holy Thursday
thread.title_full: Photos: Archbishop Aymond washes the feet of inmates in honor of Holy Thursday

author: CHRIS GRANGER | Staff photographer
title: Photos: Archbishop Aymond washes the feet of inmates in honor of Holy Thursday
text:
Photos: Archbishop Aymond washes the feet of inmates in honor of Holy Thursday
New Orleans Archbishop Gregory Aymond celebrates Holy Thursday by washing the feet of a dozen inmates at the Orleans Justice Center on Thursday, March 28, 2024. The Archbishop washed the feet of both male and female OPSO residents, recreating a key event of Holy Week when Jesus Christ washed the feet of the 12 apostles at The Last Supper.
